column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A man drove a Mazda car at high speed
column4: over steered and a central divider
column5: causing severe damage at 12:40 AM on August 9
column7: along Street 271 in Sangkat Boeung Tumpun I
column9: Phnom Penh.------According to sources at the scene
column11: the Mazda with license plate Phnom Penh 2BI 4422 was seen traveling from north to south at high speed when it arrived at the scene. The car smashed into the concrete divider
column12: causing one wheel to fall off.------Fortunately the crash did not cause any injuries
column13: while the driver got out of the vehicle and escaped from the scene.------After the incident
column14: local authorities arrived at the scene to contact the traffic experts of the Phnom Penh Municipal Police to lift away the car and keep it
